parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the application. You can obtain the application ID on the Application Management page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the job instance in the running state.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The ID of the job. You can obtain the ID of the job on the Task Management page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The ID of the namespace. You can obtain the namespace ID on the Namespace page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: NamespaceSource
parameters.description: The source of the namespace. This parameter is required only for a special third party.
